query:
ALTER TABLE notification_preferences 
ADD COLUMN digest_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN digest_frequency ENUM('daily', 'weekly') DEFAULT 'daily',
ADD COLUMN last_digest_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL;

ADD COLUMN digest_frequency ENUM('daily', 'weekly') DEFAULT 'daily',
ADD COLUMN last_digest_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL;
